name: Từ vựng các hành động bảo vệ môi trường (Environmental Actions)

words.example: We must protect our planet from pollution.
It is important to conserve natural resources for future generations.
We should try to reduce our carbon footprint.
Don't throw away that bottle; you can reuse it.
Remember to recycle your plastic bottles and paper.
Turning off lights when leaving a room helps save energy.
Taking shorter showers is a good way to save water.
